rules.name: Relentless Onslaught
rules.lore: The necrons possess countless terrifying engines of war. When mustered in great number, these instruments of annihilation sweep across the battlefield, obliterating any foolish enough to cross their path.
rules.text: Attacks made against enemy units within range of an objective marker have +1 to the Hit roll. Ranged weapons equipped by your +Necrons+ +Vehicle+ and +Necrons+ +Mounted+ units (excluding +Titanic+ units) have +[Assault]+.

strategems.name: Dimensional Tunnel
strategems.effect: Until the end of its Activation, models in your unit can move horizontally through models and terrain features.

strategems.name: Endless Servitude
strategems.target: Your +Necrons+ unit that just finished its Activation

strategems.name: Merciless Reclamation
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Activation, whenever your unit attacks an enemy unit within range of an objective marker, add 1 to the attack's Wound roll.
